sentences.english: The receptive apex of the pistil of a flower, on which pollen is deposited at pollination.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊花柱顶部，授粉时花粉被旋转于此。

sentences.english: Pistil is the seed-producing part of the flower.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊是花结种的一部分。

sentences.english: The female part is the pistil.
The stigma is the sticky knob at the top of the pistil .
sentences.chinese: 柱头是长在雌蕊最顶端的带有粘性的球。

sentences.english: Most flowering plant species bear hermaphrodite flowers with functional stamens and carpels.
sentences.chinese: 大多数有花植物着生具有功能性雄蕊和雌蕊的两性花。

sentences.english: Botany The receptive apex of the pistil of a flower, on which pollen is deposited at pollination.
sentences.chinese: 花雌蕊花柱顶部，授粉时花粉被旋转于此。

sentences.english: When the pistil receives pollen, it will grow into a fruit.
sentences.chinese: 当雌蕊接受花粉后，它会长成果实。

sentences.english: A pistil composed of two or more united carpels.
sentences.chinese: 包含两个或多个心皮的雌蕊。

sentences.english: The result showed that abortion was one of reasons for low set fruit percentage.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃雌蕊败育是导致其座果率低的原因之一。

sentences.english: Pistil head with a basal membranous appendage.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊头状花序具一基部的膜质附属物。

sentences.english: Other plants bear unisexual flowers, with only stamens or carpels functional, and others reproduce asexually.
sentences.chinese: 其他植物具单性花，即只有一种功能性雌蕊或雄蕊。

sentences.english: Ovary wall ruptured 4~5 days after fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊子房壁在授粉后4～5天破裂。

sentences.english: Having either stamens or pistils but not both.
sentences.chinese: 不完全的只有雄蕊或雌蕊的。

sentences.english: The central part of the floret primordium changes directly into gynoecium.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊原基由小花原基的中央部分直接发育而成。

sentences.english: Epigyny The type of flower structure in which the perianth and androecium are inserted above the gynoecium , giving an inferior ovary, fused with the receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 指花被和雄蕊群着生于雌蕊群之上的花的结构类型。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of transmitting tissue in the pistil of sweet, potato (Ipomeoa batatas) has been observed.
sentences.chinese: 对甘薯雌蕊引导组织细胞的超微结构进行了观察分析。
